By clicking on "Connect" button initialize connecting to Database and then to server.
clickOnDisconnect(MouseEvent) - Method in class gui.ServerFormController
When the user will click on the disconnect button, it will close the server, the database connection and will close all the users that connected to the client.
clientConnected(ConnectionToClient) - Method in class server.ServerController
If client is connected, it will update the tableview of clients in the server gui.

ClientDetails saves the information of the client if the client conncted to the zli server.

Hook method called each time a client disconnects.
